Cashfree Payments integration for proces: 用于处理付款、退款以及管理付款链接和现金图的无现金付款集合。
Your Cashfree Client ID: 您的无现金客户端 ID
Your Cashfree Client Secret: 您的无现金客户端密钥
Connect your Cashfree account\n\nThis co:
Connect your Cashfree account

This connector requires Cashfree API credentials (Client ID and Client Secret). Important: each Cashfree product is a separate product and requires its own credentials. For example, the Payments API and the Payouts API each need their own Client ID / Client Secret pairs.

Create two connections (recommended)
- For clarity and security we recommend creating two separate Activepieces connections:
  1. **Payments connection** — use the Payments API Client ID / Client Secret. Use this connection for payments-related actions (create order, payment links, refunds, etc.).
  2. **Payouts connection** — use the Payouts API Client ID / Client Secret. Use this connection for Cashgram and other payouts-related actions.

Which keys to use
- Payments API: use the credentials generated for the Payments product.
- Payouts API (required by Cashgram actions): use credentials generated from the Payouts dashboard.

How to generate API keys:
1. Sign in to your Cashfree account and open the *Payouts* dashboard.
2. In the navigation panel select **Developers**.
3. Click **API Keys**.
4. Click **Generate API Keys** on the API Keys screen.
5. The **New API Keys** popup displays the Client ID and Client Secret.
6. Click **Download API Keys** to save the keys locally. Keep these secret — do not share them.

为无现金订单启动退款。退款只能在最初交易后六个月内开始。
Cancel a payment link in Cashfree Paymen: 在 Cashfree 支付网关中取消付款链接。只有活动状态中的链接可以取消。

Create a Cashgram for instant money tran: 使用 Cashfree 为即时货币转账创建一个现金表

Fetch all refunds processed against an o: 从无现金支付网关中获取所有退款。
Deactivate a Cashgram to prevent further: 停用一个现金图以防止使用无现金兑换。
Choose the environment for API calls: 选择 API 调用环境
Bill amount for the order. Provide up to: 订单的帐单金额。最多两位小数（例如上午10时15分意味着Rs 10和15分）
A unique identifier for the customer. Us: 客户唯一的标识符。仅使用字母数字值 (3-50 个字符)
Customer phone number (minimum 10 digits: 客户电话号码(至少 10 位数字)。对于国际号码，前缀 +
Customer email address (3-100 characters: 客户电子邮件地址 (3-100 个字符)
Customer bank account. Required for TPV: 客户银行账户。TPV所需(第三方验证) (3-20个字符)
Customer bank IFSC. Required for TPV (Th: TPV需要的客户银行IFSC(第三方验证)
Customer bank code. Required for net ban: 客户银行代码。使用TPV进行净银行支付所需。
Order identifier in your system. Alphanu: 您的系统中的订单标识符。字母数字，"_" 和 "-" (3-45 个字符)。如果不提供的话，将自动生成
Order note for reference (3-200 characte: 参考订单备注 (3-200 个字符)
URL to redirect customer after payment c: 支付完成后重定向客户的 URL (最多250个字符)
HTTPS URL for server-to-server notificat: 服务器到服务器通知的 HTTPS URL (最大250个字符)
Type of terminal (e.g., SPOS) for SoftPO: SoftPOS 订单的终端类型(如SPOS) (4-10个字符)
Terminal ID for merchant reference (3-10: 商人引用的终端 ID (3-100 个字符)
Mobile number of the terminal/agent/stor: 终端/代理/商店前台的移动号码
Name of terminal/agent/storefront: 终端/代理/商店前台名称
Note given by merchant while creating th: 商人在创建终端时给出的便笺
Custom tags as JSON object. Example: {\": 使用 JSON 对象的自定义标签。例如：{"product":"Lappop","city":"班加罗尔"}。最多10 个标签
使用此链接要收集的金额。最多提供两个小数点后才能配对
A brief description for which payment mu: 必须收取付款的简短描述 (最大500个字符)
Unique identifier for the link. Alphanum: 链接的唯一标识符。字母数字，"-" 和 "_" (最大50个字符)。如果不提供则自动生成

Minimum amount in first installment (req: 第一次安装中的最小金额(如果部分支付启用则需要)

HTTPS URL for server-to-server notificat: 服务器到服务器通知的 HTTPS URL
URL to redirect user after payment compl: 付款完成后重定向用户的 URL (最多250个字符)
Directly open UPI Intent flow on mobile: 在移动设备上直接打开 UPI 意向流
Comma-separated values: cc,dc,ccc,ppc,nb: 逗号分隔的值：cc,dc,ccc,ppc,ppc,upi,paypal,应用程序。留空用于所有方法
Key-value pairs as JSON. Maximum 5 key-v: Key-value pairs as JSON. 最大 5 key-value pairs. 例如：{"key_1":"value_1","key_2":"value_2"}
JSON array for Easy Split. Example: [{\": 简易拆解的 JSON 数组。例如：[{"vendor_id":"vendor1","amount":100}]
Amount to be refunded. Should be lesser: 要退还的金额。应小于或等于交易金额。(允许小数)
An unique ID to associate the refund wit: 与退款关联的唯一ID。提供字母数字值 (3-40 个字符)
A refund note for your reference (3-100: 您参考的退款备注 (3-100 个字符)
JSON array for vendor splits. Example: [: JSON 阵列用于供应商分割。例如：[{"vendor_id":"vendor1","amount":100},{"vendor_id":"vendor_2","百分比":25}]
Custom Tags in JSON format {\"key\":\"va: JSON格式中的自定义标签 {"key":"value"}。允许最多10个标签。例如：{"refund_reas":"customer_request","processed_by":"admin"}
Request ID for the API call. Can be used: API请求ID。可以用来解决科技问题
UUID format idempotency key to avoid dup: UUID 格式的流行病密钥以避免请求失败或超时重复操作
The payment link ID that you want to can: 您想要取消的付款链接 ID。只能取消激活链接。

UUID format idempotency key for request: UUID 格式的流行病密钥用于请求重复
Unique ID of the Cashgram. Alphanumeric,: Cashgram的唯一ID。允许字母、下划线(_)，下划线(-) (35个字符限制)
Date to expire the cashgram link. Format: Cashgram 链接过期的日期。格式: YYYY/MM/DD (从创建起最多30天)
